backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the full backend for a personal website, with persistent state and CRUD operations for Resume, BlogPost, Memory, Article, and StudyMaterial types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each product feature (theme, homepage, resume, blog, etc.) to the specific frontend/backend files and test IDs that implement them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON dictionary providing one-sentence descriptions of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's component and page structure.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes (home, resume, blogs, memories, articles, study material) wrapped in the AdminProvider context.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddArticle: Admin form for creating a new article with title, optional cover image URL, and content fields, using the useCreateArticle mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddBlogPos: Admin form for publishing a blog post with title, content, and a dynamic tag management UI, using the useCreateBlogPost mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddMemoryF: Admin form for adding a new memory with title, description, and image URL fields, using the useAddMemory mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddStudyMa: Admin form for adding study material with title, subject dropdown, description, and content fields, using the useAddStudyMaterial mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Tabbed admin panel that aggregates all content management forms (resume, blog, memory, article, study material) in a single UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditResume: A form component for editing resume data (summary, skills, work experience, education) that fetches existing resume data and submits updates via React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/AdminToggle.tsx: Modal dialog component with a PIN input field that calls the AdminContext's toggleAdmin function to unlock or lock admin mode.
frontend/src/components/ArticleCard.tsx: Clickable card component for an Article that displays an optional cover image, publication date, title excerpt, and a 'Read more' link navigating to the full article page.
frontend/src/components/BlogPostCard.tsx: Clickable card component for a BlogPost showing publication date, title, content excerpt, and tag badges, navigating to the full post on click.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a site footer with a copyright year, tagline, and a branded link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/MemoryCard.tsx: Displays a single memory item as a card with an image (or fallback icon), title, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus, active-link highlighting, and admin mode controls including login and logout.
frontend/src/components/StudyMaterialCar: Card component for a study material item showing a color-coded subject badge, title, and description with click handling.
frontend/src/components/WorkExperienceTi: Renders a vertical timeline of work experience entries, each showing position, company, date range, and description.
frontend/src/contexts/AdminContext.tsx: Provides a React context for admin mode, exposing a PIN-based toggle (hardcoded '1234') and an exit function to manage admin state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login status, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend CRUD operations covering resume, blog posts, memories, articles, and study materials using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyMaterialFilte: A hook that filters a list of study materials by subject, deriving a sorted unique subject list and the filtered results from the selected subject.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a warm earthy OKLCH-based design token palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlePage.tsx: A detail page that fetches and displays a single article by ID, showing its cover image, title, publication date, and paragraph-split content with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesListingPage.t: A listing page that displays all articles in a responsive grid, shows an admin panel when in admin mode, and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListingPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all blog posts fetched via React Query, showing skeletons while loading and an empty state with admin guidance. Renders the AdminPanel when the user is an admin.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Renders a single blog post by ID (from URL params), displaying title, publication date, tags, and paragraph-split content. Shows skeletons while loading and an error state if the post is not found.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Hero landing page with a background image, welcome copy, and CTA buttons linking to Blog and Resume. Below the hero, renders a grid of navigation cards for all major site sections.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesPage.tsx: Displays a masonry-style gallery of memory cards fetched via React Query, with loading skeletons and an empty state. Shows the AdminPanel for admin users.
frontend/src/pages/ResumePage.tsx: Renders the resume with sections for summary, skills badges, work experience timeline, and education, all fetched via React Query. Includes admin panel access and appropriate loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMaterialPage.tsx: Lists study materials in a filterable grid by subject, with a detail dialog that shows full content on card click. Supports admin panel, loading skeletons, and empty states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, serif/sans font families, border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes. Enables dark mode via class and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 3) for a personal website with sections for resume, blogs, memories, articles, and kids' study material, including feature IDs, requirements, and image requirements.
